live_updates: Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
Technical Crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37668.summary: Some customers in Douglasdale are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37668.title: May 23 – Calgary | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
